summary: In this colorful satire, the first German feature-length animated film of the post-war era, the animals of the world want peace on earth. They call a big conference to which representatives of every animal species must attend.
cast: Anita Bucher|Paul Bürks|Rosemarie Fendel|Ernst Fritz Fürbringer|Klaus Havenstein|Erich Kleiber|Maria Landrock|Bruni Löbel|Charles Regnier|Anton Reimer|Thomas Reiner|Georg Thomalla|Ursula Traun|Heidi Treutler
title: Die Konferenz der Tiere
